variable.name: bcr_patient_barcode
variable.description: The unique identifier for an individual patient(public CDE id 2673794)

variable.name: bcr_surgery_barcode
variable.description: A text code or name to represent an access route for the administration of agents or substances.(public CDE id 2003586)

variable.name: procedure_type
variable.description: The yes/no/unknown indicator that asks whether the recurrence was treated by surgery.(public CDE id 2199761)
